attributes.action: Inform the general public that e-petitions are a convenient way for the Prime Minister to avoid having to deal with the reailty of a couple of thousand petitioners delivering their petition, by hand, to the front door of 10 Downing Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
e-Petitioning is a very convenient mechanism by which the Prime Minister mitigates against the risk of a collective protest in person and the inconvenience that such a protest will cuase.

ALL protests should be conducted in a civil and peaceful manner. Such peaceful protests shouldn't be disruptive.

E-petitioning is not disruptive.
As such I ask you to question as to whether e-petitions have any specific value.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
